thread.title: New York Mets vs. Chicago Cubs NLCS Game 3 live updates
thread.title_full: New York Mets vs. Chicago Cubs NLCS Game 3 live updates

title: New York Mets vs. Chicago Cubs NLCS Game 3 live updates
text:
New York Mets vs. Chicago Cubs NLCS Game 3 live updates Updated October 20, 2015 10:12 PM By NEWSDAY.COM Reprints + - New York Mets second baseman Daniel Murphy (28) reacts after his solo home run in the third inning during Game 3 of the NLCS against the Chicago Cubs at Wrigley Field on Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015. Photo Credit: Newsday / Thomas A. Ferrara 
advertisement | advertise on newsday 
Game 3 of the NLCS between the Mets and the Cubs at Wrigley Field is underway. 
The Mets lead the best-of-seven series, 2-0. Jacob deGrom is starting for the Mets, and Kyle Kendricks toed the rubber to start the game for the Cubs. Latest Mets stories See also NLCS Game 3 boxscore: Mets vs. Cubs Vote Mets vs. Cubs: Who has the edge? 
TOP 1: Curtis Granderson safe at first on error by shortstop Javier Baez. Granderson caught stealing second. David Wright singled to left center. Daniel Murphy struck out looking. Yoenis Cespedes doubled to left, Wright scored. Lucas Duda flied out to left. 
BOTTOM 1: Dexter Fowler struck out looking. Kyle Schwarber homered to left. Kris Bryant flied out to right. Anthony Rizzo singled to left. Starlin Castro singled to left, Rizzo to second. Jorge Soler grounded out to short. 
TOP 2: Travis d'Arnaud singled to center. Michael Conforto walked, d'Arnaud to second. Wilmer Flores grounded into fielder's choice to shortstop, d'Arnaud out at third. deGrom grounded into 6-4-3 double play, Flores out at second. 
advertisement | advertise on newsday 
BOTTOM 2: Miguel Montero flied out to center. Hendricks struck out swinging. Javier Baez struck out swinging. 
TOP 3: Granderson struck out swinging. Wright struck out swinging. Murphy homered to center. Cespedes flied out to center. Mets NLCS Game 3: Mets vs. Cubs 
BOTTOM 3: Fowler fouled out to third. Schwarber walked. Bryant struck out swinging. Rizzo grounded out to shortstop. 
TOP 4: Duda singled to right. d'Arnaud struck out swinging. Conforto lined out to second. Flores flied out to right. 
BOTTOM 4: Castro grounded out to second. Soler homered to right center. Montero flied out to center. Chris Coghlan, hitting for Hendricks, strikes out swinging. 
TOP 5: Clayton Richard relieved Hendricks. deGrom grounded out to third. Granderson walked. Wright singled to left, Granderson to second. Murphy grounds into 5-4-3 double play, Wright out at second. 
BOTTOM 5: Baez grounded out to third. Fowler grounded out to catcher, Schwarber grounded out to short. Mets Mets playoff run 
TOP 6: Trevor Cahill relieved Richard. Cespedes singled to right. Duda sacrifice bunts, Cespedes to second. Cespedes stole third. d'Arnaud grounded out to third. Conforto struck out, advanced to first on wild pitch, Cespedes scored. Flores hit ground-rule double to right, Conforto to third. deGrom flied out to left. 
BOTTOM 6: Bryant struck out swinging. Rizzo flied out to center. Castro lined out to left. 
TOP 7: Alex Wood relieved Cahill. Granderson struck out swinging.
